page.title: 06MERLIN 1
page.content: At MERLIN there used to be a Rampump, before they had mains water. It pumped water from springs.The water was pumped 80 feet up and they had 8000 gallons of water in a water tank. There used to be lots of elm trees but most are dead from storms,but they mostly have gorse and blackthorn trees. They have a few problems with badgers and foxes which make holes in the fields and then the ground caves in.They have 4 sheep,2 sheep dogs and a goat.They have 40 steers of beef in the barns.There are buzzards in the woods which the farmers like because they eat the rats.Most of the buildings are built out of slate,granite and elvan stone.Merlin used to be called Moorland. There is an old canal built in 1770,running from Mawgan Porth to St.Columb.It was supposed to carry sand from Mawgan
